Uses of Interface
edu.rit.pj2.tracker.BackendRef

  • Packages that use BackendRef 
    Package Description
    edu.rit.pj2
    Package edu.rit.pj2 contains Parallel Java 2 (PJ2), an API and middleware for parallel programming in 100% Java on multicore parallel computers, cluster parallel computers, supercomputing grids, and cloud computing services.
    edu.rit.pj2.tracker
    Package edu.rit.pj2.tracker contains classes for the Parallel Java 2 (PJ2) Tracker and related classes.

    • Uses of BackendRef in edu.rit.pj2

      Classes in edu.rit.pj2 that implement BackendRef 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  Backend
      Class Backend provides an object and main program that runs a Task on a certain node of a cluster.

    • Uses of BackendRef in edu.rit.pj2.tracker

      Classes in edu.rit.pj2.tracker that implement BackendRef 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  BackendSender
      Class BackendSender provides an object for sending messages to a Backend.
      Methods in edu.rit.pj2.tracker with parameters of type BackendRef 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void JobSender.taskLaunched(BackendRef backend, long taskID, String name)
      Tell this job that the given task was launched on the given backend.
      void JobRef.taskLaunched(BackendRef backend, long taskID, String name)
      Tell this job that the given task was launched on the given backend.
